resources.string: Can\'t login. Please check your email and password. Make sure wifi is on. The server may be down
There is an error. The registration is not completed. The server may be down. Please make sure you have wifi and try again.
There is error changing password. The server may be down. Please make sure you have wifi and try again later.
Your current password entered was incorrect. Please try again.
The asking product was saved. It will be shown to the user who bid your product.
There is missing information. Please make sure you fill in the product name and product category.
A email with the reset password link was sent to your email.
There is an error in the server. Please try again later. Make sure you have wifi.
The product was successfully sent to the server. It will be available to all the users who read the products offering list.
There is error sending the product\'s information to the server. Please make sure you have wifi and try again later.
Please make sure to fill in product name, category and duration information.
